00042 {
00044     // wrapper for gethostname()
00045     inline std::string get_hostname()
00046     {
00047         char buffer[MAX_PATH] = { '\0' };
00048         gethostname(buffer, sizeof(buffer));
00049         return std::string(buffer);
00050     }
